verses.t: LordO {H3068}, rebuke{H3198} me not in thine anger{H639}, neither chasten{H3256} me in thy hot displeasure{H2534}.chief…: or, overseerSheminith: or, the eighth
Have mercy{H2603} Lordupon me, O {H3068}; for I am weak{H536}: LordO {H3068}, heal{H7495} me; for my bones{H6106} are vexed{H926}.
My soul{H5315} is also sore{H3966} vexed{H926}: Lordbut thou, O {H3068}, how long?
Return{H7725}, LordO {H3068}, deliver{H2502} my soul{H5315}: oh save{H3467} me for thy mercies'{H2617} sake.
For in death{H4194} there is no remembrance{H2143} of thee: in the grave{H7585} who shall give thee thanks{H3034}?
I am weary{H3021} with my groaning{H585}; all the night{H3915} make I my bed{H4296} to swim{H7811}; I water{H4529} my couch{H6210} with my tears{H1832}.all…: or, every night
Mine eye{H5869} is consumed{H6244} because of grief{H3708}; it waxeth old{H6275} because of all mine enemies{H6887}.
Depart{H5493} from me, all ye workers{H6466} of iniquity{H205}; Lordfor the {H3068} hath heard{H8085} the voice{H6963} of my weeping{H1065}.
LordThe {H3068} hath heard{H8085} my supplication{H8467}; Lordthe {H3068} will receive{H3947} my prayer{H8605}.
Let all mine enemies{H341} be ashamed{H954} and sore{H3966} vexed{H926}: let them return{H7725} and be ashamed{H954} suddenly{H7281}.
